titles.title: A joint resolution to disapprove a rule promulgated by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency relating to emission standards for certain steam generating units.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged pursuant to 5 U.S.C. 802 (c).

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 430.

action.text: Motion to proceed to consideration of measure made in Senate.
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 139.

bill.summary: 2/16/2012--Introduced. Disapproves and nullifies the rule submitted by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) relating to national emission standards for hazardous air pollutants from coal- and oil-fired electric utility steam generating units and standards of performance for fossil-fuel-fired electric utility, industrial-commercial-institutional, and small industrial-commercial-institutional steam generating units.
